method.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add onion and garlic and cook together for 3 min or until softened.
Add the peppers to the pan and cook for 3 min. Stir in quorn and cook for 2 min, stirring frequently.
Add the tomatoes and tomato puree to the pan. Bring to the boil then simmer gently for 15 min.
Stir the mushrooms into the sauce and cook for 5 min.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti in a large saucepan of boiling water for the cooking time stated on the pack.
Drain the spaghetti thoroughly. Divide between warmed serving plates.
Top with the bolognese sauce. Scatter over the Parmesan cheese. Garnish with fresh basil.
